entry.title: Removing the Bell on Emacs
entry.content:
As I started blogging again with Spotify on the background, I noticed how annoying the audible bell is. Of course, there is a variable visible-bell which toggles between the audible and the visible bell. The visible bell in OS X is an ugly square that appears over the Emacs window, and which is pretty much useless.

Fortunately there is yet another variable ring-bell-function which, if non-nil, will be called as a function instead of showing/ringing the bell. So all I need to set the bell to a reasonable value is:

cl ;;; Turn audible and visible bells off (setq ring-bell-function (lambda ()))
